issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: i test a table for about 6000000000 data, when I use limit  then not any problem if no limit then log message as comments  version:2.0.0  tez 0.8.2

comments.body:
